titles.title: A resolution recognizing the Bicentennial Anniversary of Zebulon Montgomery Pike's explorations in the interior west of the United States.
A resolution recognizing the Bicentennial Anniversary of Zebulon Montgomery Pike's explorations in the interior west of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes the year 2006 as the 200th anniversary of Zebulon Montgomery Pike's discoveries throughout the American West.
